prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: I apologize, but there is no actual document or text provided after "Take information from this document:". Without any content to analyze, I cannot extract or summarize any information. If you would like me to extract important knowledge from a document, please provide the full text or content that you want me to work with.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
